tasks.task: Participate in soil health improvement practices on a farm
subtasks: Introduce native grass species in sensitive areas
Utilize cover crops to enhance soil carbon sequestration
Recognize that carbon and organic matter are equivalent in soil health
Monitor and address salt issues in soil
Maintain soil moisture and structure in varying weather conditions
Foster soil biota and organic matter
Apply fertilizer more efficiently due to improved soil structure
Realize yield gains from healthy soil
Improve quality of life for family members through sustainable practices
Educate landowners on practices for improved soil health
Provide continuous learning and sharing of agricultural knowledge
Strive to improve land conditions over time
